I ran into a small problem with our index addressing

If I have
```a = zeros(3)
N = PowerManifold(Circle(),3)```
and do a
```julia> a[N,1]
0-dimensional Array{Float64,0}:
0.0```
where I would have expected the same as when doing `a[1]`. How can we best fix that?
It seems to be one of my last things to do (hopefully) for the Manopt 0.3.0 release (mutating problem member functions!)
